entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LoggerMessage interceptor for LoggerExtension methods #102633
    Future
  • apphost.exe not created for TestTrimming=true + TestNativeAot=true #102632
  • Use of AssemblyNameInfo is wrong in TraceRuntimeDescToTypeSystemDesc #102630
  • any limitations on EventCounters on Linux? #102629
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102623
    9.0.0
  • Rsa.Encrypt() is retuning "Error occurred during a cryptographic operation" after migration from .net6 to .net8 #102620
  • Provide a way to verify which thread owns a lock #102621
  • Include WinForms trimming feature switch information #102619
  • Debug build errors out #102618
    9.0.0
  • Firefox MT typeload exceptions #102615
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect configuration mapping #102609
  • What's the difference between the lock keyword and the new.NET 9 Lock class? #102608
  • compilation gives error SYSLIB1094 for a GeneratedComInterface interface deriving from an interface in another project #102602
  • Make System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher cross-plattform (Linux/macOS support) #102601
  • Can't create X509Certificate using X509KeyStorageFlags.Exportable on Mac Catalyst or iOS #102600
  • Can't export X509Certificate on macOS (CoreCLR) #102599
  • System.Text.Json can't deserialize ISO dateTime to DateOnly #102594
    Future
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Don't include non-`IEquatable` structs in records #102593
  • String.ToUpper with Turkish CultureInfo doesn't work on Android #102622
  • [x86] stress failure in RayTracer.GetNaturalColor with DOTNET_JitStress=2 #102590

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add byte[] support in System.Text.Json #102626
  • Websocket callback missing for the Ping/Pong Frames RFC6455 [bug] #100771
  • Crash on Rosetta for double mapping jitted code #102226
  • Assert failure(PID 1640 [0x00000668], Thread: 19388 [0x4bbc]): x > base #102585
  • Test failure: Write_HeadersToClosedConnectionSynchronously_ThrowsHttpListenerException #21022
  • CLR profiling: DoStackSnapshot returns wrong Instruction Pointer #9448
  • Path.ChangeExtension with an empty string behaves differently on Linux and Windows platforms #100687
  • [QUIC][8.0] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success Stream aborted by peer (268) #98786
    9.0.0
  • Timeout in System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests #86019
    9.0.0
  • Performance downgrade on RSA Export methods on system with OpenSSL 3+ #102603
  • [HTTP/3] SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success timing out #55774
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8.0.5 SDK Release Schedule #102522
  • Question - is it fine to bootstrap coreclr in DllMain? #102596
  • Package Native AOT C++ sources for separate compilation on customer machines #102586
    Future
  • C# .NET Framework issue WinHttpException: Error 12175 calling WINHTTP_CALLBACK_STATUS_REQUEST_ERROR #102452
    Future
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue failed in CI #102479
  • Abort on mono in SwiftErrorHandling #102478
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64].net9preview4sdk can't be used on ARM64OS. #102056
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect gchandle #102637
    area-Debugger-mono
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` similar to NAOT #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Fix test results publishing for host and illink tests #102635
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix assembly name parsing in dotnet-pgo tool #102634
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix build break on osx/arm64 Debug #102631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Allow Time in ISO strings when deserializing DateOnly #102627
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Make CreateAppHost test use TestArtifact instead of its own class #102625
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Use Sdk not installer flow for wasm build tests #102624
    NO-MERGE, area-Workloads
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    area-System.Net
  • [release/9.0-preview5] Update implicit versions for 6,7,8 #102607
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNarrowing() #102605
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Move Disposal of QuicStream to the Http3Connection Prototype #102597
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 3 #102592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix dn_vector_custom_resize #102591
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Bump prerelease version to 6 #102589
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102588
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] mmap/lock free allocator optimizations #102265
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #102509
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Allow non-IMemberDefinition sources to be origin for event methods #102613
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Check for all expected warnings, then fail if any are unmatched #102286
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move jitopt and rpo experiments to PerfVipers #102575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update condition for NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack build #102507
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove explicit EMSDK_PATH in devcontainer.json #102598
    needs-area-label
  • ARM64-SVE: LeadingSignCount, LeadingZeroCount, PopCount #102548
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [mobile][infra] Update mobile-related area subscribers #102569
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Update mono struct lowering to use MonoMemoryManager #102486
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v18 #102231
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Update prerequisites to add azure.identity #102274
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #102529
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, source-build, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Aging stacks #102415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • ILLink: Add test for event warning origin issue #102405
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102582
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102570
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Added cases to reuse the set if comparer matches #102182
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons #102248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Produce a smaller SDK #41128
  • Compile Error After Upgrading - SDK 8.0.300, "AspNetCore" cannot be found #41126
  • Improve workload ID naming in VS #41125
  • Add default values for WinForms trimming #41122
  • Updating SDK to 8.0.300 Causes Compile Error in Razor Class Library Project #41119

Closed

  • Cannot install maui-android workload on Ubuntu 24.04 in Docker #41123
  • Repository consolidation #41127
  • .NET 8: Enable .NET product to be optimized by making SDK construction coherent #16895
    Backlog
  • dotnet/sdk README links point to dotnet/installer which points back to dotnet/sdk #41118

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable test that was blocking codeflow #41135
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update to 8.0.3, 4, and then 5 to prep 8.0.4xx for insertions #41134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update init-source-only.proj #41132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • List `win-x86` under known runtime packs for AOT #41130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose streams created by File.Create #41120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add new property: VerifySdkTarballItem #41104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • preview 6 branding #41099
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add the installer's package table to SDK docs #41098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix empty lines when logging repo artifacts #41121
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use SdkTarballPath prop if provided #41124
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/roslyn/0001-ambiguous-call-site.patch #41089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move more logic from the Controller.Session down to the SignatureHelpService #73678
  • Cannot define a raw string literal ending in double-quote #73677
  • Automatic line wrapping, taking into account the specified formatting and language syntax. #73671
  • C# needs a feature to "Show all called methods" for any given method implementation. #73669
  • Incorrect receiver capture with `ref C` receiver and interpolation handler #73667
    17.11
  • Option to default the Extract Interface destination to "Add to current file" #73666
  • "Quick Actions and Refactorings" should include suggesting changing the existing declaration to "public" as a proposed fix for error CS0737 #73664
  • CodeLens: References to local functions are not displayed #73663
  • Collection expressions are suggested for types where it doesn't make sense, and their error messages show inconsistent types #73655

Closed

  • Assigning members of ICollection types with collection initializers can provably cause NullReferenceExceptions #73679
  • New syntax related APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73552
  • Delay updating the problem window contents #73665
  • "Remove and Sort Usings" doesn't take care of compiler directive #73662
  • Virtual indentation of multiline text strings. (Editor Feature) #73661
  • Run code clean up -- Can you remove redundant blank lines like CShapier? #73672
  • Shorthand Switch Case Guards #73670
  • Don't build doc-only changes #50261
    Backlog
  • Disable most test jobs in PR builds #57313
    17.6 P2
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34922.180 #73652

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid having to go back to the UI thread in the navbar code #73681
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Convert interval-tree type to a struct #73676
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce cost of syntactic classification by around 25% while paging down through a file (and around 50% while arrowing down). #73673
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Slow down the work navbar does, and cancel updating it when receiving a high volume of user events #73680
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Expose XAML IDiagnosticSourceProvider names #73674
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move EnC workspace tests down to Features layer #73660
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Strengthen language version tests for Ref Struct Interfaces #73607
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Add test for F1 on "allows ref struct" #73654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement ICollection<T> on ArrayBuilder #73659
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Shipping tasks #73617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2459255 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Updated projects #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55856
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55855
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55854
  • Make Blazor More Extensible #55853
  • miniwebapi Failed to read parameter "Parameters para" from the request body as JSON #55848

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json #55849
  • With Blazor .NET 8, using JSHost.ImportAsync in component in a Razor Class Library (RCL) to load a collocated JavaScript module doesn't appear to work #55817
  • Blazor 8 - delegating handler cannot use local/session storage #55770
  • Databinding in Blazor: Is it possible to use Complex type as a property type on a Component for databinding? #55773
  • Blazor Web assembly string injection is slow #55816
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #55808
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #55842
  • When using the alpine:latest base image in Docker with .NET Core 8.0, the DateTime format may not work correctly. #55834

PullRequests

Created

  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, area-middleware

Merged

  • Update branding to preview6 #55846
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • [browser] Support separation hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #55716
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How are we doing in the repo? Survey inside! #22623
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly if set through Binding #22607
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border doesnt expand on Content size changed #22606
    .NET 8 SR6
  • ImageButton RippleEffect not working in some cases #22603
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon #22594
    Backlog
  • Buttons with corner radius still have rectangular input areas #22591
    Backlog
  • Maui App crashes whenever it is killed in background by Android and then restarted by OS. How to investigate or solve? #22590

Closed

  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: setSpan (12 ... 12) ends beyond length 10 #21944
  • How to know what version of Maui/.NET each pull request goes into #22619
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Border inside frame cause dont render content #18526
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Could not find a driver for automationName 'XCUITest' and platformName 'iOS'. #20452
    Backlog
  • Could not find a driver for automationName 'UIAutomator2' and platformName 'Android' #20482
    Backlog
  • Problem clearing VisualStates of collection items in a CollectionView, when the collection employs a DataTemplate generated with a DataTemplateSelector #22541
  • GtkSerializer should use transcoding stream #22598
  • Optimize allocations via ArrayPool/MemoryPool in Crc64HashAlgorithm.cs and other places #22599
  • Use stackalloc for multiple instances of arrays of constant size #22600
  • Expose TimeZoneChangedEvent in Maui.Essentials #22601
  • Incorporate a throwhelper into Maui.Essentials #22602
  • Follow CA1825 Use Array<T>.Empty in all instances #22604
  • Employ .NET [Auto]Vectorization features #22605
  • Changing ControlTemplate on Frame dynamically from XAML with DataTrigger does not trigger change on screen #21947
  • Can't connect from MS Visual Studio to MAC #20931
  • (1)NU1301 Error in MAUI Project: Unable to Retrieve Repository Signature Information for NuGet Source (2)MAUI App Crashes on Windows After Visual Studio 17.10.0 Update: Error Code 0x80070005 #22593
  • Rotate screen on ios <= 15 #22608
  • Optimize allocations via ArrayPool/MemoryPool in Crc64HashAlgorithm.cs and other places #22596
  • GtkSerializer should use transcoding stream #22597

PullRequests

Created

  • Add additional GC.Collect for tests #22624
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
  • [testing] Try xunit 2.6.6 with 2.8.0 vs runner #22621
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category #22609
    area-testing

Merged

  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨, t/perf
  • Update appium/drivers versions #22552
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Disable OneLoc for now #22595

Updated

  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In-memory sqlite crash depending on connection string style #33800
  • Full-Text Search not working with Global Query Filter #33799
  • DateTime.MaxValue Exceeds Supported Timestamp Bounds #33798
  • Cosmos: support projecting out (primitive) collections #33797
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: support computed properties #33796
    Backlog
  • Support of graph databases for EF Core #33795
    Backlog
  • Tags go missing when using GroupBy() #33794
  • EntityTypeAttributeConventionBase disappeared #33793
  • Relational: support queries converting a relational rowset to a primitive collection #33792
    Backlog
  • Translation of impure functions can result in wrong queries #33791

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.7 to 2.1.8 #33790
  • Publish binaries for BinSkim #33786

Updated

  • Simplify `TRUE = expr` in filtering contexts #33776
  • [release/8.0] Pass sequence annotations (#33780) #33781
  • Clean up query translator/expression namespace and file placement #33782
  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to integrate dotnet/installer into SDK and download the latest unpublished preview version, such as SDK release 9.0.100-preview6.xxxx for macOS's pkg file? #19837

PullRequests

Created
